gmcm.section.general.name: General
gmcm.enableDebugLogging.name: Enable debug logging
gmcm.enableDebugLogging.tooltip: Log which tracks are requested and whether they are replaced.
gmcm.section.general.tooltip2: Modify the settings below to add more logging to SMAPI Console
gmcm.showSuggestionsAlways.name: Display lines to copy to replace music
gmcm.showSuggestionsAlways.tooltip: Print suggested musicReplacements.json keys when a track is requested for easy copy and paste into your musicReplacement.json.
gmcm.vanillaInsteadPercent.name: Chance to play vanilla music
gmcm.vanillaInsteadPercent.tooltip: If a custom music replacement exists, this percent chance will let the original vanilla track play instead of custom audio. Defaults set at 0 so vanilla song doesn't play if custom audio exists.
gmcm.page.replacements.title: Turn On / Off - Music Replacement
gmcm.page.replacements.tooltip: Enable/disable specific replacement entries per content pack.
gmcm.replacements.header.tooltip: Toggle individual replacement files on/off. Disabled entries are removed from shuffle pools.
gmcm.replacements.packToggle.name: Enable this music pack
